message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to let it go for $12000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $12500. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $12000 is a fair price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12000?

I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a good price. I can offer it to you for $12750. This is my final offer, so think carefully before responding.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but I need to get a good deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12250?
